TopicTitle: Stranded Kerbals in orbit is missing.

Articles.Content:
Has a problem with two standard rescue missions in low kerbin orbit.

The Kerbals and their pods are missing, contract state low orbit and the only thing in low orbit is an science probe after I cleared up the empty pods from old missions.

Yes all of them had take command and not watch in mission control.

Has tried to restart game but they don't spawn.

Is it only to fail the mission?

Has a problem with two standard rescue missions in low kerbin orbit.

The Kerbals and their pods are missing, contract state low orbit and the only thing in low orbit is an science probe after I cleared up the empty pods from old missions.

Is it only to fail the mission?

Make sure that the appropriate filter is enabled for the type of part they are in.

Make sure that the appropriate filter is enabled for the type of part they are in.

I make sure everything is visible, icon show up as a ship but both known and unknown space objects are also visible.

Know about problems with rescue missions in high orbit who can run into Mun but this should not be an issue in LKO
Lol. Found one of them, landed not far from soace center, game crashed on recovery and I thought it was a rocket on pad
